org.optaplanner.core.impl.score.director.easy

Class EasyScoreDirector<Solution_>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.optaplanner.core.impl.score.director.AbstractScoreDirector<Solution_,EasyScoreDirectorFactory<Solution_>>
      • org.optaplanner.core.impl.score.director.easy.EasyScoreDirector<Solution_>
  • Type Parameters:
    Solution_ - the solution type, the class with the PlanningSolution annotation
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Cloneable, InnerScoreDirector<Solution_>, ScoreDirector<Solution_>

    public class EasyScoreDirector<Solution_>
extends AbstractScoreDirector<Solution_,EasyScoreDirectorFactory<Solution_>>
    Easy java implementation of ScoreDirector, which recalculates the Score of the working solution every time. This is non-incremental calculation, which is slow. This score director implementation does not support ScoreDirector.getConstraintMatchTotals(), ScoreDirector.getConstraintMatchTotalMap() and ScoreDirector.getIndictmentMap().
    See Also:
    ScoreDirector
